src:
Ini Bocoran Spesifikasi Galaxy S10 Lite
04 Nov 2019, 07:05 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: GSM Arena

Jakarta - Kendati bocoran soalGalaxy S11 sudah wara-wiri, ternyataSamsung masih ingin menambah varianGalaxy S10. Konon ponsel tersebut akan bernamaGalaxy S10 Lite, berikut sejumlah bocoran spesifikasinya.Kendati ada embel-embel Lite, ponsel ini mengusung dapur pacu yang mumpuni.Snapdragon 855 menjadi otaknya yang dipadukan dengan RAM 8 GB.Layarnya pun cukup lapang, bentangannya 6,7 inch. Resolusinya Full HD+ dan menggunakan panel Super AMOLED seperti kebanyakan ponsel Samsung lainnya.LayaknyaGalaxy S10e, terdapat satu kamera di bagian depan yang ditempatkan di layar. Tapi ukurannya jauh lebih tinggi, yakni 32 MP. Vendor asal Korea Selatan ini menyertakan tiga kamera di bagian belakangnya. Kamera utamanya 48 MP, lalu sisanya 12 MP dan 5 MP.Kapasitas baterainya jiuga cukup besar, 4.370 mAh. Dibekali pengisian cepat 45W. Ponsel ini akan hadir dalam pilihan warna putih, hitam dan biru. Kendati speknya cukup menarik, sayangnya belum ada informasi kapan ponsel ini akan dirilis. Bisa jadi di akhir tahun ini untuk menyambut musim liburan Natal dan Tahun Baru. Kita tunggu saja. Simak Video "Berikut Bocoran Spesifikasi Galaxy S Series Baru"[Gambas:Video 20detik](afr/afr)
text:
This is the leaked specifications of the Galaxy S10 Lite
Nov 04 2019, 07:05 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: GSM Arena

Jakarta - Although the leak about the Galaxy S11 has been mutually exclusive, it turns out that Samsung still wants to add the Galaxy S10 variant. It is said that the phone will be named Galaxy S10 Lite, following a number of specifications leakage. Although there are frills Lite, this phone carries a capable kitchen runway. Snapdragon 855 becomes its brain combined with 8 GB RAM. The resolution is Full HD + and uses a Super AMOLED panel like most other Samsung phones. Like the Galaxy S10e, there is one camera on the front that is placed on the screen. But the size is much higher, which is 32 MP. This South Korean vendor includes three cameras on the back. The main camera is 48 MP, then the remaining 12 MP and 5 MP. The battery capacity is also quite large, 4,370 mAh. 45W fast charging. This phone will be available in a choice of white, black and blue. Although the specs are quite interesting, unfortunately there is no information when this phone will be released. It could be at the end of this year to welcome the Christmas and New Year holidays. We wait for it. Check out the video "Here are the Leaks of the New Galaxy S Series Specifications" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (afr / afr)
